Message:
I hope all is well with
Nadia, Sasha, and Chilki.

As your secretary,
I sincerely apologize
for not being able to be
by your side at the moment.

You must be fraught with worry
by my sudden disappearance,

but I assure you that I am safe,
so please put your mind at ease.

Currently, I am under
the care of the Duke of Fran.

Fran.
It must be your first time
hearing of a country
by such a name.

But that is only
to be expected, I suppose.

For I am not in
the Gilsanian Empire,
or even on the continent
of Centrea...
